abstract: Misunderstanding over play and subsequent harsh words between New York Yankees coach Joe Espada and infielder Mark Teixeira is unusual episode for team, which was known in past for lively tempers but is now considered quite subdued.
lead_paragraph: Teixeira, thrown out after having been told by the third-base coach Joe Espada to take it easy as he rounded third, knocked over a trash can in the dugout and then criticized Espada to reporters after Monday night’s win.

headline.main: Mark Teixeira Eases His Pace and, Eventually, His Temper
headline.print_headline: Teixeira Eases His Pace and, Eventually, His Temper

snippet: Teixeira, thrown out after having been told by the third-base coach Joe Espada to take it easy as he rounded third, knocked over a trash can in the dugout and then criticized Espada to reporters after Monday night’s win.
